trends: There have been no other sightings in catoosaor keetonville,okl
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and i were in my car,pulled over to light a cigarette.we saw two orbs of light in front of us ,about 30 yards high and 40 yards in front of us.one orb was bright blue and the other bright red.moving around in a circle about twenty feet apart.in a cicle opposite one another.thats when we saw a metalic disc come out of what appeared to be artificle fog.It moved down and towards us.we could see a ring of windows around the craft.they were close enough to see and count the beings inside.four of them were small-child like in size -one was taller and one was the tallest.we were scared and started to leave real fast-when a satrnge blueish light hit us.the next memory we had was sitting in the car,the motor had died,the cigarette had burnt up,we were slumped over in our seats,and it was darker than it should have been.I think we lost 30 minutes to as much as hour of time.we looked up were the craft had been just in time to watch it leave.I removed an implant from my third finger,about two weeks later.my son still has one near his elbow,and is having it removed by a docter a.s.a.p.-this is very real,it is the factual truth.It happened to us and we are still very concerned about what they did to us,and why they did it.we can only speculate what the implants are for and what effect it will have in the future.I have been investigating the implants theorys and none of them sound to good.If god did not put it there,i wanted it out.still concerned very much about my son.I wish i knew what their agenda was and is.!!!If you see a disc in the air -run fast!! and good luck,getting away.we were on keetonville road just north of 193rd.st east.which is actually a highway junction i believe.north of catoosa-193rd-to keetonville road on your left-north,we were at the bottom of that hill.that's where it happened.the metalic disc moved slowly at first then shot away like a bullet,heading south.it had been hovering over the port of catoosa.not sure what it was doing.?we were in the wrong place at the wrong time.that was something you never forget ,but don't like to talk about to strangers.the rate of speed in which it left is mind boggeling-to say the least.-would like for mufon director to contact me again.I told a mufon representative years ago,lost contact with him due to my house caught on fire-and i was dissplaced for some 6 months, if your out there contact me again,you know my name and i'm in the phone book -new #.look forward to hearing from you a.s.a.p.-I would like to talk to you again,or the state chief representative for oklahoma -mufon-director.Only MUFON OFFICIAL REP, PLEASE.i WISH TO REMAIN ANONYMOUS TO ALL OTHERS,FOR SECURITY REASONS.Don't want the men in black,if you know what i mean.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: my son and i saw disk.it lowered toward us-we were abducted&implanted
